content:
RibbonSplitButtonLabelPosition Enum

Definition

Provides values that indicate the position of the label of a RibbonSplitButton.

In this Article

public enum RibbonSplitButtonLabelPosition
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
RibbonSplitButtonLabelPosition

Fields

DropDown

Indicates that the label should be positioned in the drop-down section of the RibbonSplitButton.
Header

Indicates that the label should be positioned in the header section of the RibbonSplitButton.
